Name: sufficient_project_start_date
Description: A project must start on or before the expected date

Name: adequate_budget_allocation
Description: Sufficient budget allocation for each project phase

Name: enough_team_members
Description: The number of team members is sufficient for the task load

Name: worker_availability
Description: Workers must be available to start tasks as planned

Name: project_revenue_forecasted
Description: A project should forecast revenue adequately

Name: team_formation_complete
Description: All team members must have confirmed their roles and availability

Name: on_time_project_completion
Description: Ensure that projects are completed on or before the deadline
